game.name: House Builder
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 1인 건설 크루가 되어보세요! 전 세계를 여행하며 시대를 초월하여 상징적인 디자인을 만드세요! 불쾌한 온도와 위험한 동물군을 조심하십시오!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become a one-man construction crew! Travel around the world and through the ages to build iconic designs! Beware of unpleasant temperatures and dangerous fauna!

reviewHighlights.text: I really liked this game for the first two houses. Now the pop up "help tips" have made this game UNPLAYABLE. YOU DON'T HAVE TO TELL ME WHAT TO DO 700...
Fantastic game. You can build houses and game is constantly being updated. If you enjoy games like house flipper, you'll love this one
